item.title: HC Takes Up Pleas On Gadwal Land
item.description: <![CDATA[Justice Nagesh Bheemapaka of the Telangana High Court took on file a batch of writ pleas challenging the alleged attempts by government authorities to take possession of patta land in Gadwal for constructing a 350-bed hospital and a nursing college. The judge was hearing writ pleas filed by Chandramma and others, who contended that the plots were originally assigned for constructing houses and that their conversion for institutional purposes was arbitrary, illegal and unconstitutional. The petit...]]>
